experiences.title: Senior Manager, Strategy and Innovation (AI/ML)
experiences.subtitle: ICICI Lombard, Mumbai
workDescription: Designed an **open source chatbot** leveraging RAG and fine-tuning to handle local languages on **20+** IRDAI guidelines.
Integrated the solution into the Azure cloud platform impacting **400+** underwriters and CSMs.
Designed an NPS classification system based on **10,000+** customer feedback responses.
Developed an XGBoost-based segmentation model with an F1 score of **0.74**.

experiences.title: Research Assistant cum B.Tech Project
experiences.subtitle: Materials Informatics Lab, IIT Madras
workDescription: Conducted research on optimal compositions for shape memory alloys in aerospace and automotive sectors.
Developed a Gaussian Process Regression model achieving an R² score of 0.88, later boosted to **0.92** with feature elimination and linear regression adjustments.

experiences.title: Strategy Officer
experiences.subtitle: Ozibook Tech Solutions
workDescription: Conducted in-depth **profit and cost analysis** across 12 departments.

Created a 5-year profit projection model, which earned an LOR.
